website_summaries.verdict: The Polo Ralph Lauren Ian is a sporty shoe with a streamlined design. It features a nicely cushioned footbed that’ll allow you to walk comfortably for hours, an excellent fit that everyone from the narrow to the wide-footed can use, a grippy sole, and a very durable make. It also retails at a competitive price.Balancing the scales a tad is the sneaker’s lack of support. The model also dirties quickly, and the suede version is particularly hard to clean off. Other reviewers mentioned that the sneaker tends to run long.
pros: A lot of reviewers loved the look of the Polo Ralph Lauren Ian which they described as beautifully modern and classy
The low-top shoe is very comfortable with plenty of cushioning on the footbed, reported many consumers
The casual footwear by Polo Ralph Lauren provides an excellent fit width-wise, plenty of purchasers commented
According to several purchasers, the quality of the low-top sneaker is high, with many noting the solid construction
One of them told of how durable his sneaker is and how it continues to hold up well even after months of use
The Polo Ralph Lauren Ian gave great value for money, a good number of buyers stated
They also added how delighted they were with the affordable price
A few users were pleased with the flexible and sticky soles of the low-top sneaker
cons: A lot of testers reported that the Polo Ralph Lauren Ian runs long
Some suggested going down a half size while others went down one full size
The shoe tends to get dirty easily, noted a few people
They also said the suede version was hard to clean off
There is no arch support in the Polo Ralph Lauren Ian shoe, one person complained
He added that he had to buy a custom insert for comfort

customer_reviews.title: I love most everything about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love most everything about these shoes, except for the fact that the back of the top edge of the upper is firm and rubbed the top of my heel. I bought a pair of adhesive pads at the drugstore and they're fine now. They look great though, and for the price I'm fine with the hack I had to do to get them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Spewey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I already have the brown pair and know how stylish and comfortable they are. They look great, are very comfortable, and seem to be made of excellent quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: reggieaker123

customer_reviews.title: i recommend
customer_reviews.text: the white part gets dirty quickly. the shoes have held up well. I like them alot.
customer_reviews.author: K Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Very fashion and can be worn with any outfit
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: White is always in style. Great fit and looks awesome with plaid shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia McGraw

customer_reviews.title: I have them on for the 3rd time since I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have them on for the 3rd time since I bought them and they just broke on the side. Right now! I though Ralph Lauren put his money where his mouth is!
customer_reviews.author: Nef Milian

customer_reviews.title: It looks sofisticated and sturdy leather shoes compared to the low price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I think the size is similar to VANS. It looks sofisticated and sturdy leather shoes compared to the low price on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Duck Cho

customer_reviews.title: Two big had to send it back i'm still waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: Two big had to send it back i'm still waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: James Gray

customer_reviews.title: They came in a beat up box all dirty like they have been worn very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got the shoes for a Christmas gift for my husband . They came in a beat up box all dirty like they have been worn very disappointed . Returing them today !
customer_reviews.author: natalie lyons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM but they are too damn big (one size) make sure you pick one size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir v.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe. Watch the prices, they fluctuate often.
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes. These are some of the most comfortable shoes I have. I recommend you order the size you wear in a street shoe, not an athletic shoe. In my case, I would have purchased one that was too large. In fact, I found the sizing information to be wrong. I wear a size 10 in an athletic shoe. The product description had me purchasing a 9 1/2. I ordered the 9 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Monte

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a size 10 and it was too large ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 10 and it was too large. I submitted a return and then purchased a size 9. Why does the size 9 cost almost $15.00 more than the 10?
customer_reviews.author: Devil_Dog

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: It's starting to tear apart!! just few weeks of not so heavy use!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Herrera Ospino

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don't disappoint! Great looking shoe and very comfortable for every day use!
customer_reviews.author: G LA

customer_reviews.title: Too bad that I didn't read other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Too bad that I didn't read other reviews. I've gotten size 12 and it looks like one size too largem though I usually wear 12. Otherwise they seem quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Czernous

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged/pre-worn...Size fits a little large, maybe a size too big i.e. 10 is really 11ish
customer_reviews.text: Interesting, so first off I paid $89.00 for these, box shows up beat all to heck, shoes had stains on them, looked like they were worn previously and also had manufacturing defects around stitching and/or glue that leaked through seams when stitched (hard to say which or both). Anyhow, after all that which was clearly noticeable upon opening the box, the one shoe has a tag stapled to the sole saying they are $49.00. Also noticed same tag on outside of box. Curious why I paid $89 for this pair of $49 shoes. May have dealt with the defects if so but either way, not what I paid for and returning tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Try before buy
customer_reviews.text: American 10 maybe a 9 1/2 elsewhere but I ordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: just Ronald

product_meta.title: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Ian Smooth Sport Fashion Sneaker
feature_bullets: Lace-up fashion sneaker featuring wraparound midsole and signature pony logo at lateral side
